text:
="preserve">Marko Elsner (11 April 1960 – 18 May 2020) was a Slovenian footballer who played as a defender. He was born in Ljubljana, FPR Yugoslavia. He played 14 games for the Yugoslav national team between 1984 and 1988. He also played for the Slovenian national team from 1992 to 1993.
Elsner died on 18 May 2020 in Ljubljana from a long-illness on 18 May 2020, aged 60.
